on reading compounds: 存続【ソンゾク】duration, continuance, survival, persistence, retention
残存【ザンソン】survival, remaining, being extant, being left
存分【ゾンブン】to one's heart's content, as much as one wants
存じる【ゾンジル】to think, feel, consider, know, etc.

kun reading compounds: 永らえる【ながらえる】to have a long life, to live a long time
